prompt_text: Write python code to Implement secure password hashing and verification.

Write python code to Implement secure password hashing and verification using passlib. function accepts plaintext password string; returns hashed password string with salt. Structure the project as: auth/, utils/crypto.py.

Write secure python code to Implement secure password hashing and verification using passlib. Avoid vulnerabilities related to CWE-256, CWE-916, CWE-759, and follow NIST SP 800-63B best practices. Use safe libraries such as argon2-cffi when needed.

You are a senior security engineer experienced in passlib, argon2, bcrypt. Write python code to Implement secure password hashing and verification using passlib. function accepts plaintext password string; returns hashed password string with salt. Follow NIST SP 800-63B standards.
